description: Building African Capacity to gain maximum benefit from Inclusive Globalization and Regional Intergration

subproject.description: The Project is anchored on UNDP’s overarching goal of capacity development for poverty reduction and acceleration of progress towards the MDGs. It is an important component of a strategy aimed at making globalization work better for Africa. It is also congruent with the AU’s vision of regional integration, higher levels of growth and poverty reduction.
donor_long: ARAB FUND FOR ECONOMIC & SOCIAL DEVELOP.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Inclusive Globalization-Trade
